title: Can't leave comments on the Nexus page
body:
I can't leave comments on the Nexus page because I'm always redirected to the NA version of the site, which means that I'm not allowed to comment because my account is on EUW.
Could you please help me fix that problem?

replies.body:
Please do not necro old threads.  Locking this one down so it may Rest In Peace.

{{sticker:poppy-wink}}

You keep getting redirected to the NA Nexus page from the EU one? Weird. Try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) really quickly to make sure your browser isn't redirecting you from having been on the NA one in the past.

Exactly. If I click on the EU English Nexus page I get redirected to the NA one, but if I click on the EU Italian Nexus page I don't.
I'll try to clear my browser history and cookies as you suggested and see if that fixes the problem.
